title: Apparel Magazine, Revionics and RSR Research to Outline Strategies for Turning Underperforming Promotions Into Strategic Profit Drivers
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/8/2015 @ 3:00 AM Companies mentioned in this article: Revionics, Inc. 
AUSTIN, Texas -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Retailers have mastered the art of using promotions to drive sales; however, they are still struggling to drive profits. Recent data from RSR Research suggests many retailers are still executing unscientific, unfocused discounts with limited insight into the impact of their promotions. 
Revionics, Inc. , a global provider of End-to-End Merchandise Optimization solutions , is hosting a webinar with RSR Research , the retail industry’s only research company run by retailers, and Apparel Magazine , the business/technology resource for apparel executives. The webinar, “Retail Pricing in a Dynamic Promotional World,” will take place on Tuesday, September 15, 2015 at 11:00 a.m. EDT. 
Moderated by Susan Nichols, Publisher of Apparel, and featuring RSR Research Managing Partner Brian Kilcourse and Revionics Senior Director of Solutions Marketing Mark Schwans, the webinar will explore ways retailers can harness the power of big data to create more profitable promotions and outperform the competition. Attendees will gain actionable, research-driven insights into today’s retail pricing trends to develop strategies for implementing high-impact promotions. This is a complimentary event open to all retailers. Click here to register.
